method.name: Install
method.tp:docstring: Install a list of Downloadable Content (DLC).

method.name: GetInstalled
method.tp:docstring: Returns a list of installed Downloadable Content (DLC) modules.

arg.name: dlc_module_list
arg.tp:docstring: A serialized protobuf (DlcModuleList, src/platform2/system_api/dbus/dlcservice/dlcservice.proto) of a list of installed DLC modules.
